data.text: @AncientDemon91 @FinnairSuomi Hei, negatiivista testitulosta ei edellytetä Suomen kansalaisilta, Suomessa pysyvästi asuvilta ulkomaalaisilta eikä niiltä, joiden maahantulon perusteena on välttämätön syy kuten pakottavat perheasiat tai muut pakottavat henkilökohtaiset syyt. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@NicolasVanhove @FinnairHelps Hi, our customer service is not reading the DMs at the moment. Please use the chatbot on our website or call our customer service: https://t.co/cDvIoqH6A6. You might also be able to find an answer from the FAQs: https://t.co/DpukIZTWv7. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Lyzzie859 @TopiManner Hi, I am extremely sorry for your delayed bag. There has been some trouble in bag handling at Helsinki Airport. If you have already created the report, please wait a little bit longer. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@rachelDMG Hi, here you can find all our customer service numbers: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. The international one is open 24/7. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Please note that everyone over 7 years old is still required to wear a mask on our flights. You can choose a surgical mask, a valveless FFP2 or FFP3 mask or another kind of valveless mask following the equivalent standards (N95). https://t.co/c9LWBZrZrT https://t.co/8sgJOivVxX

data.text: We apologise for the delays in baggage handling at Helsinki Airport, and we are working hard together with our ground handling partner to improve the situation. @MarlousTravel Hi, I am very sorry about the delayed luggage! Have you already created a report about it? Here are some instructions: https://t.co/Et9mAtDc3R. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@hjjost Hi, please try again contacting our customer service and let them know that you have tried to manage it yourself. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@stefkoh @FinnairHelps Hi, I am truly sorry for this! Have you already created a report about your bags? Here are some instructions: https://t.co/Et9mAtDc3R. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travelling to Finland
urls.description: Finland has opened for travel from the EU and Schengen countries. Travel from outside of the EU and Schengen area remains restricted. Finnish authorities define the entry requirements to Finland. See more detailed instructions below. Please also note that travel restrictions are subject to change at short notice. As a traveller, you are always responsible for ensuring that you fulfil the requirements of your destination and possible transit country. You can check the current entry restrictions to Finland

data.text: Entry requirements to Finland change for fully vaccinated travellers from outside the EU/Schengen area as of 21 December, and you are required to present a negative coronavirus test result not older than 48 hours. Both PCR and antigen tests are accepted: https://t.co/10LbEoil5S https://t.co/01MNU2TSw3

Our new, distinctly Nordic cabin design, complete with a new travel class Premium Economy, brings a breath of fresh air to your long-haul travel. Stay tuned. Launching January 2022. https://t.co/zlWNj9ygBF

data.text: @MikkoUtecht @FinnairSuomi Hei, Gold-korttilaiset kuuluvat nykyään Group 2:een. Koronatodistusten vahvistaminen Finnairin mobiilisovelluksen kautta on käytössä matkustaessa Suomesta tiettyihin maihin:  https://t.co/hUHBDyjv94. Mukavaa matkaa! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@AtreyeeMukhopa1 Hi, I apologise for this inconvenience! If you weren't able to complete your booking, please try again and contact our customer service if you're still facing some trouble with it. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@robyn_poss Hi, I am truly and sincerely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service channels currently. We are working on the issue and training more employees, as we are, at the moment, getting more contacts than ever before. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@robyn_poss @k_pavitra Hi, I don't have access to bookings, unfortunately. Please contact our customer service regarding the name change. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@sergeybryukhno Hi, I am sorry for the troubles you were facing with booking. I hope you got it working? We haven't received any other reports and to my knowledge, this should be working normally. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

Mythical Finnish Lapland covered in glittering snow offers you lots to experience. And with luck, you might catch the majestic Northern Lights dancing on the dark night sky. See what kind of wonderful natural phenomena you might encounter in Finland: https://t.co/sNrvmTBB3K https://t.co/fM9LIZuERp

@dags2007 Hi, unfortunately, this feature is currently unavailable on our website. You can either book the flights separately or try to do the booking through our customer service. I apologise in advance that the waiting times might be long at the moment. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@SariSiis Hei, saman henkilön on jo nyt mahdollista tehdä useampi eri Finnair Plus -tili eri meiliosoitteilla. Meillä ei ole näkyvyyttä siihen, mikä on asiakkaalle työmatkailua tai vapaa-ajan matkailua. Heidi / Finnair

data.text: Did you know that by reducing the weight of your baggage by five kilograms, you reduce your carbon footprint by about five percent? Get to know our sustainability actions and read how you can contribute to more sustainable travel: https://t.co/JKUueno1yA

urls.title: Varaa lentosi luottavaisin mielin
urls.description: Päivitetyn lippujen varauskäytäntömme ansiosta voit nyt vaihtaa matkustuspäiviäsi joustavammin. Varaa Finnairin lennot ja matkusta luottavaisin mielin!

data.text: @JPoutanen @FinnairSuomi @FinnairHelps Hei, mikäli et saanut matkustuspäiviäsi muutettua Varaukseni-palvelussa, olethan yhteydessä asiakaspalveluumme: https://t.co/GtSKqN6bP1. Lippujen muuttamisesta löydät lisätietoa täältä: https://t.co/sqLYKp9tBx. Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

Air traffic @HelsinkiAirport has been halted for some hours due to exceptionally difficult weather conditions. Arriving Finnair flights are diverted to other airports and there are cancellations in departing flights. 
https://t.co/AGaNSg6WMv

Many of us tend to pack more than usual for Christmas and winter travels. We might even want to bring some unusual items with us. Check our five tips that help you and your baggage get a smooth start on your upcoming winter holiday: https://t.co/8jsc8Y2SKv

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: We have extended our flexible booking policy so that you can book flights and make your travel plans worry-free. Until 28 February 2022, you can change your travel dates as many times as you wish. After that, you can still make one additional change.  https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl.
Icy rain is expected to cause limitations to traffic at Helsinki Airport. We've cancelled some flights to ensure smoother operations in challenging weather. https://t.co/jpKZsRTTpB

Happy Independence Day to 104-year-old Finland! 🇫🇮 We are proud to be Finland's flag carrier connecting our northern country with the rest of the world. urls.title: How to get through the airport faster
urls.description: Save yourself some time and follow our tips to get through the airport with less stress. We recommend thinking ahead, starting from advance check-in that saves a lot of time and effort. The easiest way to check-in is with the Finnair mobile app. When you use the app, not only can you store your boarding pass, but you get real-time updates and other services such as the option to upgrade to Business Class or to purchase your seat assignment. Of course, sitting in the front of the aircraft always gives you

data.text: Are you travelling with us soon? Good planning and preparations can make a difference when you want to get through the airport faster. Follow our tips on how to move through Helsinki Airport smoother and more stress-free. https://t.co/yoq9MYIUNA

data.text: When it’s time to change the gigantic A350 engine, lots of planning, precision and many skilled mechanics are needed. We interviewed Finnair’s Powerplant Engineer Reijo Katiska to find out what it takes to change the huge engine and why it is even changed: https://t.co/ufFbdKInSo

We are training new employees in our customer service, but this takes some time, unfortunately. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@ImLittleWicked Hi, I am extremely sorry for the long waiting times currently. We are training new employees for our customer service channels, but this takes time, unfortunately. Please try contacting our customer service again. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Smooth travelling at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Flying via Helsinki means that you can enjoy the compact and uncrowded Helsinki Airport, where all the gates and services are located under one roof, in one terminal building. Helsinki Airport welcomes you with its new spacious arrival and departure halls! As the main transit area for Finnair customers, the brand-new terminal will make connections extra quick and smooth. Catching a train, bus or taxi to or from the airport is now easier than ever as everything is nearby the terminal entrance. The

data.text: The renewed and stunning @HelsinkiAirport Terminal 2 welcomes you! Finnair departure hall services are gradually moving to the new building starting from today, while the new arrivals hall is open already now: https://t.co/DitKUbDa9U. Smooth travels! https://t.co/dSqwhZ0Akr

Finnair is happy to be a part of the @traveloneworld #oneworldalliance initiative to buy 350 million gallons of SAF from @aemetis for operations at @flySFO. This joint effort highlights our commitment to decarbonising aviation. Read more at: https://t.co/FlBx2XoCk4 https://t.co/MXQdCT7qLl

urls.title: Shopping with Finnair
urls.description: Discover your shopping opportunities with Finnair and start shopping top quality brands!

data.text: We bring back our inflight shopping services on 1 December! The inflight trolley sales are available on flights outside the EU, while the renewed and extensive pre-order selection is available for both long-haul and short-haul flights. https://t.co/FQ0HNRdYSH

urls.title: Feedback and compensation
urls.description: We are currently experiencing backlog in our customer service. We are sorry for the delay in replying to your feedback. Thank you for your patience! We appreciate your feedback and are here to assist you with your claims and other concerns. Your feedback is valuable to us in developing our services further. For more general topics, please check our frequently asked questions, or get assistance from our chat service at any

data.text: @choe_jaeyeon Hi, I am extremely sorry for the technical problems on our website! In case you would like to, you can submit feedback to us here: https://t.co/QnwlxpQKFS. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@pekka_aula @FinnairHelps Hei, olen erittäin pahoillani asiakaspalvelumme pitkistä jonoista tällä hetkellä! Tiedostamme ongelman ja koulutamme uusia työntekijöitä asiakaspalvelukanaviimme. Kiitos kärsivällisyydestäsi! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@Livelyluke @FinnairHelps Hi, I am sincerely sorry for this inconvenience! We are getting an exceptionally large amount of contacts at the moment, and the lines and waiting times are unfortunately very long. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@geetanshum Hi, I am sincerely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service at the moment! Unfortunately, you would have to check with them, whether this change is possible. Sorry for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @iltasanomat Korjaus tähän juttuun: Finnair ei lennä eteläiseen Afrikkaan, eikä sieltä ole verkostoomme matkustajavirtoja.
@taloussanomat Korjaus tähän juttuun: Finnair ei lennä eteläiseen Afrikkaan, eikä sieltä ole verkostoomme matkustajavirtoja.

Finnair app is designed to give you peace of mind on the move. You can customize your flight, do your check-in, contact customer service and keep your Finnair Plus card with you. Find out how the Finnair app smoothens your journey from booking to landing. https://t.co/SBLAfDfEIq

urls.title: Smooth travelling at Helsinki Airport
urls.description: Flying via Helsinki means that you can enjoy the compact and uncrowded Helsinki Airport, where all the gates and services are located under one roof, in one terminal building. Helsinki Airport welcomes you with its new spacious arrival and departure halls! As the main transit area for Finnair customers, the brand-new terminal will make connections extra quick and smooth. Catching a train, bus or taxi to or from the airport is now easier than ever as everything is nearby the terminal entrance. The

data.text: Helsinki Airport is going through a total transformation to offer you a modern and smooth experience. Our departure hall services will gradually move to the new building starting 1 December, and the renewed arrival hall will be open already on 1 December. https://t.co/cnMldAgpmN
@eskohannula Alkuperäisellä varauksellasi pitäisi nyt siis löytyä alkuperäinen paluulentosi ja lippu on täten kunnossa. Aurinkoista päivän jatkoa! -Ada/Finnair

@eskohannula Hei Esko, olen todella pahoillani asiakaspalvelumme pitkistä jonoista. Paluulento peruuntuu automaattisesti, jos jättää menemättä menolennolle. Olemme poikkeuksellisesti palauttaneet sinulle paluulentosi, koska et saanut meihin yhteyttä ajoissa. Mukavaa kotimatkaa! -Ada/Finnair

Where should you head for the best Blues in town? Where can you find Chicago’s tastiest deep-dish pizza? What’s the must ice skating spot in the winter? https://t.co/o8G6JsuD1Q You can travel to the USA when you are fully vaccinated and have a negative coronavirus test result. https://t.co/NaYllKg9RB

urls.title: Change your booking flexibly
urls.description: With our updated ticket policy, you can now change your travel dates with more flexibility. Book Finnair flights and travel with confidence!

data.text: @sunsetchaser_ Hi, we have a flexible booking policy in place until 31 December 2021. If you bought the ticket from us, yes, you can change the travel dates. You can read more here: https://t.co/NQN3hfqxdl. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Manage booking
urls.description: Access your flights in Manage booking and start tailoring your flight experience with Finnair!

data.text: @vixtorwhois Hi, you can try doing the change yourself in our Manage booking service: https://t.co/GlMBvsVJnA. If you aren't able to do it there, please contact our customer service. I am very sorry for the long waiting times there. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@FernandoForReal @SAS Hi, I am sincerely sorry if you have received bad customer service from us. If you are referring to the long waiting times, this is something we are working on and training new employees to our customer service channels. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@pineadd32 @dtownkthmyg Hi, yes - you peel the foil and then pour it into your coffee or tea. As this is a tiny portion, it's really meant as milk for your coffee, not to be drunk out of this. :) Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @TuokkiT @FinnairSuomi Suurin osa työntekijöistämme asuu Suomessa, missä aikuisväestön rokotekattavuus on korkea. Työntekijämme ymmärtävät hyvin rokotusten merkityksen matkustuksen avautumiselle. Tietojemme mukaan Finnairin lennoilta ei ole pandemian aikana alkanut yhtäkään COVID-19-tartuntaketjua.

data.text: Hi, we will publish a travel update regarding this later this week. The current restrictions can be found in our travel requirements map: https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x or here: https://t.co/b24ZQs8ExD. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.description: Use the interactive travel map to find out where you can fly with Finnair and what guidelines you need to follow in each destination.

data.text: Thailand’s paradise-like beaches await – yet we would like to remind you to check the travel restrictions carefully. Along with being fully vaccinated and having a negative test result, you need to have an outbound flight. See our travel restrictions map: https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x. https://t.co/st06XTwTXx

urls.title: Refund form
urls.description: With this form, you can request special assistance for your flight if you have a handicap or illness, or inform us about the details of your medical device.

data.text: Due to India’s travel restrictions, we unfortunately cannot accept you on board if you’re travelling from/to other countries than listed above. Your cancelled ticket is fully refundable. You can apply for a refund at https://t.co/ujHJ588ecS if you bought your ticket from Finnair.

data.text: Finland has formed an air bubble agreement with India, which allows passengers from the EU/Schengen area, South America and Africa to travel to India via Finland. We will start flying to Delhi on 6 December 2021. https://t.co/OygDnQdT5E

data.text: @maks210162 @FinnairHelps Hi, you can apply for a refund here: https://t.co/hxX56GTfbR. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@Gracie_Burkett Hi, I am sincerely sorry for the long lines in our customer service channels at the moment! We are working on it and training new employees, but as the job requires lots of special knowledge, this takes time, unfortunately. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

urls.title: Travel requirements map

data.text: @OnTheRoadToYou Hi, please contact our customer service by chat or by calling: https://t.co/cDvIoqpvIy. You can also find answers from our FAQs: https://t.co/DpukIZClDz or travel requirements map: https://t.co/gFcDo9W37x. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

data.text: @Trader_Yoru Hi, I am extremely sorry, we are having some technical issues with Manage booking. These are being fixed and we hope to have it working soon. We are also training new employees for our customer service, but this takes time, unfortunately. Thank you for your patience! -Ada/Finnair

@yhelo Hi, I am sincerely sorry for this - we are working on fixing our Manage booking hoping to have it working as soon as possible, and also training new employees in our customer service channels. I apologise for the inconvenience for the time being. Kind regards, Ada/Finnair

@THEOGCOTUS Hi, I am sincerely sorry for the long waiting time in our customer service channels! We are working on it and training new employees, but this takes time, unfortunately, as the job requires lots of special knowledge. I apologise for the inconvenience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@TarjaEloranta Mukava kuulla, että nautit matkastasi kanssamme. Tervetuloa kyytiimme ja nauttimaan maisemista pilvien päällä taas pian uudestaan! Ystävällisin terveisin, Ada/Finnair

@LyonsMinna1 @FinnairHelps Hi, I am sincerely sorry for the long waiting times in our customer service! We are working on it and training new employees, but as the job requires lots of special knowledge, this takes time, unfortunately. Thank you for your patience! Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
@FlyingFluskey Welcome on board, I hope you will have a wonderful flight with us! 😊 Kind regards, Ada/Finnair
